title: Week 1: Project Setup & Initial Architecture
summary: Set up repo structure, defined core architecture, finalized API contract, added basic CI pipeline, and documented setup steps for contributors.

title: Week 2: Core Feature Implementation
summary: Implemented authentication flow, added user session handling, built first draft of the data ingestion module, and wrote initial unit tests.

title: Week 3: Plugin System & Integrations
summary: Developed plugin loader, created example Django integration, optimized build process, and added support for configuration overrides.

title: Week 4: UI Polishing & Documentation
summary: Refined GitHub Pages interface, added onboarding steps, improved mobile design, wrote detailed docs for installation, and prepared upcoming milestone plan.
